headline: The TJX Companies, Inc. Announces Quarterly Common Stock Dividend
summary: FRAMINGHAM, Mass., September 17, 2025--The TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE: TJX) today announced the declaration of a quarterly dividend on its common stock of $.425 per share payable December 4, 2025, to shareholders of record on November 13, 2025.

headline: ULTA's Fragrance Category Grows Double Digits in Q2: Trend to Watch?
summary: Ulta Beauty's fragrance sales surge in double digits in Q2, fueled by gift sets, exclusives and strong in-store engagement.

headline: What Drove BBWI's Raised Guidance After a Strong Q2 Performance?
summary: Bath & Body Works lifts its full-year outlook after second-quarter strength, driven by sales growth, product launches and resilient profitability.
